description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Huang Shuze.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则的逝世地。
description.en: The place of death of Huang Shuze.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则于1932年进入该学院学习。
description.en: Huang Shuze enrolled in this college in 1932.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则在北平大学医学院学习期间参加的学生爱国运动。
description.en: A patriotic student movement that Huang Shuze participated in while studying at Peiping University Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则于1938年毕业后参加的军队。
description.en: The army Huang Shuze joined after his graduation in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 位于延安的一所医院，黄树则曾在此担任医务主任、儿科主任及院长。
description.en: A hospital in Yan'an where Huang Shuze served as Medical Director, Head of Pediatrics, and President.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。黄树则曾是其保健医生。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. Huang Shuze once served as his personal physician.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的一支主力部队，黄树则曾任其卫生部副部长。
description.en: A main force of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War, where Huang Shuze served as the Deputy Minister of its Health Department.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则曾担任该机构处长。
description.en: Huang Shuze once served as the director of this agency.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，黄树则曾担任该医院院长。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Huang Shuze served as the president of this hospital.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部
en: General Logistics Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 黄树则曾担任其卫生部教育处处长。
description.en: Huang Shuze served as the Director of the Education Division of its Health Department.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国卫生部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国卫生部
en: Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 黄树则曾担任该部副部长及保健局局长。
description.en: Huang Shuze served as the Vice Minister and the Director of the Health Care Bureau of this ministry.

description.zh-cn: 负责中共中央高级领导干部健康保健工作的机构，黄树则曾是其委员。
description.en: An organization responsible for the health care of senior leaders of the CPC Central Committee, of which Huang Shuze was a member.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则曾担任该学会顾问。
description.en: Huang Shuze once served as an advisor to this society.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则出生于天津。
description.en: Huang Shuze was born in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则于1932年进入北平大学医学院学习，并于1938年毕业。
description.en: Huang Shuze entered Peiping University Medical College in 1932 and graduated in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 黄树则在北平大学医学院学习期间参加了一二·九运动。
description.en: Huang Shuze participated in the December 9th Movement while studying at Peiping University Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 1938年，黄树则毕业后奔赴延安参加八路军。
description.en: In 1938, after graduation, Huang Shuze went to Yan'an to join the Eighth Route Army.

position.zh-cn: 医务主任、儿科主任、院长
position.en: Medical Director, Head of Pediatrics, President

description.zh-cn: 1939年起，黄树则在延安白求恩国际和平医院担任医务主任、儿科主任及院长。
description.en: Starting in 1939, Huang Shuze served as the Medical Director, Head of Pediatrics, and President of the Bethune International Peace Hospital in Yan'an.

description.zh-cn: 1943年，黄树则任毛泽东的保健医生。
description.en: In 1943, Huang Shuze became Mao Zedong's personal physician.

position.en: Deputy Minister of the Health Department

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战后，黄树则任第一野战军卫生部副部长。
description.en: After the Second Chinese Civil War, Huang Shuze served as the Deputy Minister of the Health Department of the First Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战后，黄树则兼任中央直属卫生处处长。
description.en: After the Second Chinese Civil War, Huang Shuze concurrently served as the Director of the Central Direct Health Division.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，黄树则历任北京医院院长。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Huang Shuze served as the President of Beijing Hospital.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

position.en: Director of the Education Division of the Health Department

description.zh-cn: 黄树则曾担任总后勤部卫生部教育处处长。
description.en: Huang Shuze served as the Director of the Education Division of the Health Department of the General Logistics Department.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国卫生部

position.en: Director of the Health Care Bureau

description.zh-cn: 黄树则曾担任中华人民共和国卫生部保健局局长。
description.en: Huang Shuze served as the Director of the Health Care Bureau of the Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国卫生部

description.zh-cn: 黄树则曾担任中华人民共和国卫生部副部长。
description.en: Huang Shuze served as the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料，黄树则曾是中央保健委员会委员。
description.en: According to records, Huang Shuze was a member of the Central Health Commission.

description.zh-cn: 根据资料，黄树则曾是中华诗词学会顾问。
description.en: According to records, Huang Shuze was an advisor to the Chinese Poetry Society.
